subject: Re: .Possible m.eet.in.g
body:
Dear friend,
I found your picture on one of the websites, can we talk to 
each other? I might be coming to your place in few weeks.
This would be a great opportunity to ameet each othera.
bBtw, I am ab woman. I am 25. Drop me a line at hcovo@SpringMailSite.info
